episodes.title: My Experience in a Cult | The Exclusive Brethren
episodes.description:
For many generations, my family belonged to a cult or 'exclusive sect' as some may call it, called the Exclusive Brethren. In more recent times, it has been rebranded to the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church, or PBCC. 

This video is an overview of my experience and what led up to me eventually leaving one of the most secretive cults in the world.

Thank you so much for stopping by and checking out my channel.

Links:
https://www.youtube.com/@UC76fGueDJBbLvhs988yTBXQ 
(Meet the fine folks of the PBCC via their PR channel)
